in- to the dip, he was met by some of the staff, 
among them the staff officer and Zherk6v, who had been twice sent to Tiishin's battery but had never reached it. Interrupting one anoth- er, they all gave, and transmitted, orders as to how to proceed, reprimanding and reproach- ing him. Tushin gave no orders, and silently fearing to speak because at every word he felt ready to weep without knowing why rode be- hind on his artillery nag.
